name: OrganismsCombinationTestsForNucleicAcid
title: Organisms (Combination Tests for Nucleic Acid)
description: Contains codes only applicable to Encephalitis-causing organisms.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names that may be ordered or ‘observed’ for detection of more than one organism’s nucleic acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Combination Tests for Nucleic Acid by any method.),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
